name: USCoreSexExtension
title: US Core Sex Extension
description: This extension communicates sex notations in various instances, such as encounters that reflect information derived from driver's licenses or other IDs, and it aligns with the C-CDA Sex Observation (LOINC 46098-0). The [US Core Birth Sex Extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-birthsex) represents the *sex assigned at birth concept* in [U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) v1](https://www.healthit.gov/isa/sites/isa/files/2020-07/USCDI-Version-1-July-2020-Errata-Final.pdf) and [U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI) v2](https://www.healthit.gov/isa/united-states-core-data-interoperability-uscdi#uscdi-v2); however, this extension MAY also mean sex at the time of birth if it was documented at the time of delivery.

binding.description: Concepts limited to Male, Female and Patient Sex Unknown, for documentation of specific instances of sex information
